name: 2D Platformer (Theo Proulx)
description:
A simple, yet addictive, platformer for Windows x64 and x32 based systems.

With over 25 levels and more in the works, this game will absorb a good chunk of your time, with immense replayability.

This game has 25 levels, is under active development,contains a complete guide, has a cartoonish visual style, is under 200 Megabytes when fully installed, has 64 and 32 bit based versions addictive music, a fully functional options menu and so much more!

This game was made by one person (me of course). On top of that, this is my first publicly released game. This means that there are bound to be some bugs and issues, however, I will continue to work on the game in the form of bug patches and new levels (to the best of my ability). With that in mind, feel free to criticise and please, please, document any bugs you find and how you managed to find them so I can get to fixing it them straight away.

Gameplay explanation  and instruction in the readme.txt file.
